article.title: U.S. Navy to Upgrade CV-22 Training Devices
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Bell-Boeing Joint Project Office, Amarillo, Texas, is being awarded a delivery order of about $34 million for the Block 20/C Upgrade to the CV-22 Training Devices, including the Cabin Operational Flight Trainer, Cabin Part Task Trainer, and the Wing Part Task Trainer.Â The Naval Air Systems Command, Patuxent River, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
